user_query: I am planning to create a cat fact website and I need a large collection of cat facts. Can you fetch all available cat facts from your database and provide them to me? Additionally, I would like to know if a specific storage exists in GroupDocs.Conversion Cloud. Please check if the storage 'cat_facts' exists.

TaskList.description: Fetch all available cat facts from the database.
Check if the storage 'cat_facts' exists in GroupDocs.Conversion Cloud.
